errors.name: InvalidOwner
errors.msg: Input account owner is not the program address

errors.name: IncorrectLpMint
errors.msg: Address of the provided lp token mint is incorrect

errors.name: ZeroTradingTokens
errors.msg: Given pool token amount results in zero trading tokens

errors.name: InitLpAmountTooLess
errors.msg: Init lp amount is too less(Because 100 amount lp will be locked)

errors.name: CalculationFailure
errors.msg: Calculation failed due to overflow or division by zero

errors.name: InsufficientSandwichAmount
errors.msg: Calculated sandwich amount is too small to be profitable
